baseline_groups.claim_summary: Incarceration reduces crime: releasing prisoners via collective pardons increases total crime, estimated via IV-2SLS using pardon-induced prison population changes.
baseline_groups.notes: IV-2SLS of log change in total crime on log weighted change in jail pop, instrumented by pardoned fraction. Negative coef means releasing prisoners increases crime. Paper Table 2 col 1.

global_notes: Single core claim tested with IV-2SLS. 52 specs. Some p-values exceed 1.0 indicating computational issues. LIML identical to 2SLS (just-identified). Clustering variations change only SEs.
